title: Ginger Pear Smoothie
prep: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Almond butter adds healthy fats.

title: Cranberry Chia Pudding
prep: Soak chia. Top with berries/nuts.

title: Stuffed Sweet Potato
prep: 1. Roast:Bake sweet potato (whole or cubed) until tender (approx 25-30 mins).2. Stuff/Assemble:Mix cooked quinoa, rinsed black beans, and massaged kale. Stuff into the split potato or arrange in a bowl.3. Serve:Drizzle with a dressing made of tahini and lemon juice. Top with pumpkin seeds.

title: Fennel Lime Tonic & Nori
prep: Juice fennel. Mix with lime water. Serve with toasted nori.

title: Miso Glazed Tempeh
prep: 1. Marinate:Whisk miso, tamari, maple syrup, and sesame oil. Cube tempeh and toss in marinade. Let sit for 15-30 mins.2. Cook Tempeh:Pan-fry tempeh over medium-high heat until golden and caramelized (approx 5-8 mins).3. Sides:Steam bok choy (3-4 mins). Saut cauliflower rice with a splash of water or oil until tender.4. Serve:Assemble in a bowl and drizzle with any remaining fresh tahini.

title: Chamomile Maca Moon Milk
prep: Steep tea in hot milk. Whisk powders.

title: Cucumber Mint Green Juice + Tofu Scramble
prep: 1. Juice:Juice cucumber and mint (or blend and strain).2. Scramble:Crumble firm tofu. Saut in olive oil with turmeric and black salt for 5 mins.3. Veggies:Steam asparagus until tender-crisp. Chop and mix with tofu and fresh dill.4. Serve:Plate the scramble with the green juice on the side.

title: Rainbow Collard Wraps
prep: 1. Prepare Leaves:Blanch collard leaves in boiling water for 30 seconds, then plunge into ice water. Pat dry and trim the thick stem spine carefully.2. Make Paste:Mash red lentils (cooked) with tahini, minced garlic, and a squeeze of lemon until spreadable.3. Assemble:Spread lentil paste on each leaf. Top with shredded carrot, avocado slices, and bean sprouts.4. Roll:Fold sides in and roll tightly like a burrito.

title: Mineral Broth & Edamame
prep: Heat broth with miso/wakame. Add edamame.

title: Coconut Curry Red Lentil Soup
prep: 1. Roast Squash:Toss delicata squash cubes with oil and roast at 200C for 20-25 mins until tender.2. Base:Saut diced onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. Stir in curry paste for 1 minute.3. Simmer:Add red lentils, coconut milk, and stock. Simmer for 15-20 mins until lentils are soft.4. Serve:Ladle soup into bowls and top with roasted squash.

title: Lemon Balm Tea
prep: Steep tea. Stir in flax.

title: Glow Bowl
prep: Roast fennel. Arrange greens. Top with beans/artichokes/fennel. Drizzle with pesto.

title: Zucchini Noodle Pho
prep: 1. Infuse Broth:Simmer vegetable broth with star anise, cinnamon stick, ginger slices, and onion for 15 mins. Strain if desired.2. Add Veggies:Add sliced shiitake mushrooms and simmer for 5 mins.3. Finish:Add tofu cubes and zucchini noodles (zoodles) for just the last 1-2 minutes to warm through without overcooking.4. Serve:Top with fresh basil, sprouts, and lime.

title: Golden Milk
prep: Whisk all ingredients in hot milk.

title: Lemony Quinoa & Chickpea Bowl
prep: Assemble bowl. Whisk lemon juice/oil dressing. Drizzle over.

title: Warm Apple Pie Oat Bake
prep: 1. Mix:Combine rolled oats, chopped apple, cardamom, and a splash of almond milk/water in a baking dish.2. Bake:Bake at 180C for 20-25 minutes until oats are set and apples are soft.3. Serve:Top with a dollop of hemp yogurt and fresh pear slices.

title: Cinnamon Maca Latte
prep: Heat milk/spices. Serve with edamame.

title: Farro Power Bowl
prep: 1. Prep Components:Cook farro according to package instructions. Roast halved Brussels sprouts at 200C for 20 mins.2. Tempeh:Pan-fry tempeh cubes with a splash of tamari until crispy.3. Dressing:Whisk tahini, lemon juice, 1 tbsp water, and a drop of maple syrup until smooth.4. Assemble:Combine farro, sprouts, and tempeh. Top with pomegranate seeds and dressing.

title: Cacao Chia Protein Pudding
prep: Soak chia/powders. Top with raspberries.

title: Walnut Crusted Tofu
prep: 1. Crust Tofu:Mix crushed walnuts with spices. Dip pressed tofu slabs in almond milk, then press into walnut mix.2. Bake:Place tofu and sweet potato wedges on a baking sheet. Bake at 200C for 25-30 minutes until crispy.3. Veggies:Briefly steam or saut green beans with garlic.4. Serve:Plate tofu with fries and beans.

title: Reishi Hot Chocolate
prep: Whisk heated ingredients.

title: Savory Chickpea Scramble
prep: 1. Scramble Base:Roughly mash chickpeas and tofu with a fork.2. Saut:Saut chopped onion and tomatoes in a pan until soft. Add chickpea/tofu mix.3. Season:Add turmeric, black salt (kala namak), and pepper. Cook 5-7 mins.4. Finish:Stir in fresh spinach until wilted. Remove from heat and fold in pesto.

title: Hearty Tempeh Chili
prep: 1. Saut:Cook onions, garlic, and peppers until soft. Add crumbled tempeh and brown lightly.2. Simmer:Add kidney beans, crushed tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, and vegetable broth. Simmer for 20-30 mins to thicken.3. Finish:Stir in raw cacao powder right before serving for depth.

title: Lime Spiced Pepitas & Tea
prep: Roast pepitas with spices. Serve with tea.

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Seitan
prep: 1. Toss:Combine seitan chunks, asparagus spears, and fennel wedges on a sheet pan. Toss with olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, and garlic powder.2. Bake:Roast at 200C for 20 minutes until golden and veggies are tender.3. Serve:Garnish with fresh orange zest or slices.

title: Tulsi Tea
prep: Steep.

title: Blue Spirulina Smoothie Bowl
prep: Blend all. Decoration optional.

title: Mediterranean Lentil Salad
prep: 1. Roast Eggplant:Cube eggplant, toss with oil and salt. Roast at 200C for 25 mins.2. Salad Base:Combine cooked lentils, roasted eggplant, diced tomatoes, chopped parsley, and cucumber.3. Dressing:Whisk tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and a splash of water.4. Serve:Toss salad with dressing while warm or cold.

title: Rainbow Sushi Bowl
prep: 1. Rice:Cook black rice according to package. Stir in a little rice vinegar when done.2. Prep:Cube smoked tofu. Slice avocado and cucumber. Cut nori into small strips.3. Assemble:Arrange everything in a bowl.4. Dress:Drizzle with tamari and sesame oil.

title: Sage & Lavender Tea
prep: Steep.

title: Overnight Buckwheat Groats
prep: Soak overnight. Top with cherries/yogurt.

title: Fire Tonic & Lentil Waffles
prep: 1. Tonic:Mix warm water, apple cider vinegar, grated ginger, and a pinch of cayenne.2. Waffles:Blend soaked red lentils (or use flour), chickpea flour, water, baking powder, and salt. Cook in a greased waffle iron until crisp.3. Serve:Drink tonic first. Top waffles with kimchi and sliced avocado.

title: Grapefruit & Pumpkin Seed Brittle
prep: Bake seeds. Serve with grapefruit.

title: Thai Basil Zucchini Noodles
prep: 1. Tofu:Pan-fry tofu cubes with soy sauce until golden.2. Sauce:Whisk almond butter, coconut milk, lime juice, ginger, and garlic until creamy.3. Noodles:Spiralize zucchini. Toss zoodles in the sauce briefly to warm (don't cook too long).4. Serve:Top with tofu and fresh Thai basil leaves.

title: Rosemary Cacao Truffle
prep: Mix and chill.

title: Turmeric Cauliflower Steaks
prep: 1. Steaks:Slice cauliflower into thick "steaks". Brush with oil, turmeric, cumin, and paprika.2. Roast:Bake at 200C for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway, until tender and charred.3. Base:Warm the cooked beluga lentils and massage the kale with lemon.4. Serve:Place steaks over lentils/kale and drizzle with tahini.

title: Dandelion Root Latte
prep: Heat and whisk.

title: Carrot Cake Chia Parfait
prep: Layer chia pudding with grated carrot/cream.

title: Moroccan Chickpea Stew
prep: 1. Base:Saut onion, garlic, and ginger with cumin, cinnamon, and turmeric.2. Simmer:Add chickpeas, chopped tomatoes, dried apricots, and broth. Simmer for 20 mins.3. Greens:Stir in spinach at the end to wilt.4. Serve:Spoon stew over fluffy cooked millet.

title: Green Apple & Almond Butter
prep: Slice and dip.

title: Grilled Tofu Tikka
prep: 1. Marinate:Coat tofu in coconut yogurt mixed with tikka spices, lime, and ginger. Let sit for 20+ mins.2. Grill/Bake:Grill skewers or bake tofu at 220C until edges are charred (approx 20 mins).3. Sides:Serve with heated cauliflower rice and a cooling cucumber/mint salad.

title: Holy Basil Tea
prep: Steep.

title: Metabolic Mocha Smoothie
prep: Blend.

title: Charred Broccoli & Bean Bowl
prep: 1. Char:Toss broccoli florets with oil and roast at high heat (220C) or pan-sear until charred/browned.2. Combine:Mix warm broccoli with cannellini beans.3. Serve:Toss generously with Romesco sauce (roasted red pepper & almond sauce).

title: Fennel Tea
prep: Steep.

title: Sweet Potato Nourish Bowl
prep: 1. Roast:Roast sweet potato wedges at 200C until tender.2. Kale:Remove kale stems and massage leaves with a little olive oil and salt to soften.3. Dressing:Whisk maple, miso, and apple cider vinegar.4. Serve:Assemble bowl with quinoa, potato, kale, and drizzle with dressing.

title: Baked Raspberry Almond Oats
prep: 1. Mix:Combine oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and almonds.2. Wet:Mix mashed banana (if using in base) or maple syrup with milk and melted coconut oil. Fold into dry mix.3. Bake:Stir in raspberries. Pour into ramekin. Bake at 180C for 20-25 mins.4. Serve:Drizzle with coconut yogurt.

title: Spiced Cacao & Pepitas
prep: Warm drink + seeds.

title: Creamy White Bean Soup
prep: 1. Saut:Saut onion, garlic, and celery until soft.2. Simmer:Add white beans (cannellini) and veggie stock. Add a sprig of rosemary. Simmer 15 mins.3. Blend:Remove rosemary. Blend soup until creamy (add almond milk if needed).4. Serve:Serve hot with a slice of sourdough.

title: Choc Dipped Orange
prep: Dip slices.

title: Smoky Tempeh Pot Pie
prep: 1. Filling:Saut onion, carrots, celery. Add crumbled tempeh. Stir in flour or starch to coat, then pour in broth to create gravy.2. Crust:Make a simple cassava flour dough (flour, oil, water) or top with mashed potato.3. Bake:Place filling in dish, top with crust. Bake at 200C for 25-30 mins until bubbling and golden.

title: Tart Cherry Mocktail
prep: Mix.

title: Banana Buckwheat Muffins
prep: 1. Batter:Mash banana. Whisk with almond milk and a tsp of oil. Stir in buckwheat flour, baking powder, and cinnamon.2. Bake:Fold in walnuts. Spoon into muffin tin.3. Cook:Bake at 180C for 20-25 minutes. Let cool slightly.

title: Cozy Miso Soba Bowl
prep: 1. Broth:Simmer ginger slices, garlic, and shiitake mushrooms in vegetable stock for 10 mins.2. Miso:Whisk miso with a little hot water separately. Turn off heat and stir into broth (don't boil miso).3. Noodles:Cook soba noodles, rinse cold. Place in bowl.4. Serve:Ladle soup over noodles. Top with tofu cubes and scallions.

title: Carrot Cake Energy Balls
prep: Blend & roll. Serve with tea.

title: Gnocchi Sage Butter
prep: 1. Cook Gnocchi:Boil gnocchi until they float. Drain.2. Sage Sauce:Heat olive oil or vegan butter in a pan. Fry fresh sage leaves until crisp. Add walnuts.3. Toss:Add gnocchi to the pan and saut for a few minutes to crisp the outside.4. Serve:Pile over a bed of fresh rocket.

title: Lemon Balm Valerian
prep: Steep.

title: Berry Chia Jam Toast
prep: Toast bread. Top with jam. Serve with tofu.

title: Lentil Bolognese Squash
prep: 1. Squash:Cut squash in half lengthwise, remove seeds. Roast cut-side down at 200C for 40 mins. Scrape out strands.2. Sauce:Saut onion, carrot, celery. Add lentils, crushed tomatoes, and dried herbs. Simmer 20 mins.3. Serve:Top squash strands with heavy scoop of bolognese.

title: Creamy Mushroom Stroganoff
prep: 1. Saut:Saut sliced mushrooms in olive oil until browned. Add garlic and thyme.2. Sauce:Stir in cashew cream (blended cashews + water), nutritional yeast, and mustard. Simmer to thicken.3. Noodles:Cook rice noodles. Toss immediately with the sauce.4. Serve:Top with parsley.

title: Kava Tea
prep: Steep.
